Class Waypoints

  • java.lang.Object
    • novice.Waypoints

  • public class Waypoints
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Waypoints.

    Tools for working with collection of MPoint objects.

    Since:
    April 13, 2014

        public static java.util.ArrayList<MPoint> readUTMFromTSV(java.io.File f)
        Read UTM data from Tab Separated Value file (TSV). Assumes data has a header and is of format: station# Easting Northing
        Parameters:
        f - the TSV file to read
        Returns:
        the array list of MPoints

      • readLatLonFromTSV

        public static java.util.ArrayList<MPoint> readLatLonFromTSV(java.io.File f)
        Read lat/lon data from Tab Separated Value file (TSV). Assumes data has a header and is of format: station# Latitude Longitude
        Parameters:
        f - the TSV file
        Returns:
        the array list of MPoints

      • readLatLonFromCSV

        public static java.util.ArrayList<MPoint> readLatLonFromCSV(java.io.File f)
        Read lat/lon data from Comma Separated Value file (CSV). Assumes data has a header and is of format: station#, Latitude, Longitude
        Parameters:
        f - the CSV File
        Returns:
        the array list of MPoints

        Parameters:
        _gps - the ArrayList of MPoints to convert.

      • readUTMFromCSV

        public static java.util.ArrayList<MPoint> readUTMFromCSV(java.io.File f)
        Read UTM Easting/Northing from Comma Seperated Value (CSV) File. Assumes data has a header and is of format: station#, Easting, Northing
        Parameters:
        f - the CSV File
        Returns:
        the array list of MPoints from file

      • exportToCSV

        public static void exportToCSV(java.util.ArrayList<MPoint> _gps,
               java.io.File f)
        Export ArrayList of MPoints to CSV File. File is written with a header with a format: Station, Easting, Northing, Elevation
        Parameters:
        _gps - the MPoint ArrayList to export.
        f - the file to write.

        Parameters:
